home.title: Home
home.name: Hello! I'm Priscila
home.msg: With more than 5 years of experience in UI/UX, my career includes challenging projects that have enriched my skills in creative and functional design.

services.title: My Skills
services.text: Boost your image, build your success: a good page speaks excellence about your company.

design.title: User Interface
design.text: Every detail of my interface is carefully designed to ensure a smooth and effective experience. I not only care about aesthetics, but also about driving your business goals and improving user retention. Whether for mobile applications, sites website or other digital products.

seo.title: User Experience
seo.text: I specialize in creating memorable and efficient digital experiences that captivate from the first click. I immerse myself in the psychology of your potential customers, creating intuitive, attractive and functional interfaces that convert visitors into loyal customers.

redesign.title: UX Design
redesign.text: My approach focuses on understanding the needs and wants of your users to design interfaces that are easy to use, attractive and effective. My goal is to ensure a smooth and satisfying digital experience for your customers, which contributes to achieving of your business objectives.

prices.title: Projects
prices.bubble: I use research and analysis methodologies to inform every step of the design process

ceppa.title: Ceppa - Website
ceppa.text: The main objective was to create an intuitive and attractive user experience, facilitating navigation and access to information for patients. I incorporated calming visual elements and a clear structure to convey confidence and professionalism, optimizing interaction and satisfaction of the user.

novatrip.title: Marketplace
novatrip.text: These web pages facilitate commercial transactions, allowing customers to browse product catalogs, add items to the shopping cart, and check out using online payment methods

dia.title: UX-UI Research and Redesign Dia Online
dia.text: This project's main objective is to improve the user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) of our online shopping platform, optimizing navigation, accessibility and customer satisfaction.

barber.title: Mobile Web App to Schedule Barber Appointments
barber.text: Focused on facilitating appointment scheduling, the application allows customers to book their services quickly and easily, selecting their preferred barber, the type of service and the convenient time.

boda.title: Interactive Web App for Wedding Invitation
boda.text: The app allows users to explore event details, RSVP and personalize their responses in an easy and fun way. Designed with elegant aesthetics and intuitive functionalities, the web app ensures smooth navigation and rich interaction for all users.

us.title: About Me
us.name: My name is Priscila, with more than 5 years of design experience I specialize in UI/UX.
us.text: My background has provided me with a solid foundation in various aspects of design, from conceptualization to the implementation of creative and functional solutions, working on challenging projects that have continually broadened my perspective and enriched my skills.

contact.title: Contact
contact.bubble: Ready to make magic together! Contact me to bring your ideas to life.
